'''1.16.0.2''' is a major update for the [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s, released on June 23, 2020, that updates the servers for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.0]] and fixes a bug.

== Changes ==
; [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s
* Updated for 1.16.0 clients.
* Improved documentation. ({{bug|BDS-3051}}, {{bug|BDS-3141}})

== Fixes ==
* {{cmd|save query}} gives backup path once again. ({{bug|BDS-1085}})
